title: Getting Error for eth get transaction receipt
body:
While doing a curl on the server for eth get transaction receipt 
`curl --data '{"method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":[["0x80757153e93d1b475e203406727b62a501187f63e23b8fa999279e219ee3be71"]],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545`

getting error as of below.
`{"jsonrpc":"2.0","error":{"code":-32603,"message":"Internal error","data":"System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
   at Nethermind.Db.DbExtensions.Get(IDb db, Keccak key)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Receipts.PersistentReceiptStorage.FindBlockHash(Keccak txHash)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Receipts.FullInfoReceiptFinder.FindBlockHash(Keccak txHash)
   at Nethermind.Facade.BlockchainBridge.GetReceiptAndEffectiveGasPrice(Keccak txHash)
   at Nethermind.JsonRpc.Modules.Eth.EthRpcModule.eth_getTransactionReceipt(Keccak txHash)
   at System.RuntimeMethodHandle.InvokeMethod(Object target, Void** arguments, Signature sig, Boolean isConstructor)
   at System.Reflection.MethodInvoker.Invoke(Object obj, IntPtr* args, BindingFlags invokeAttr)"},"id":1}`
